mapper.select: SELECT l.*, e.name as employee_name, a.name as approver_name FROM leave_request l LEFT JOIN employee e ON l.employee_id = e.id LEFT JOIN user a ON l.approver_id = a.id WHERE l.id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO leave_request (employee_id, type, start_date, end_date, days, reason, status, create_time) VALUES (#{employeeId}, #{type}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, #{days}, #{reason}, #{status}, NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM leave_request WHERE status = #{status}
